replies.body:
{tag=5a0b55defddb448caf5070856cbf39ee} 

Well, we're having my birthday celebration today and I ordered this cookie dough cake, so probabaly that xd.

{tag=0e56116560bf49e6aa383db002ad7d08}

Person: You're honestly so friendly and I'm so glad I got to meet you. You were an extremely good junior mod and I can't wait to see how you perform as a full mod. You tend to stress a lot which isn't needed xd, but overall a real chill nice player.

Player: I haven`t seen you much as a player, but seeing as you`re in Cronus and how well they`re doing, you probably aren`t that bad.

I kind of found "Acceqted" wasn't mature and "Strucken" was. There was some things I did as Acceqted and in a way I wanted a clean slate or restart.

I have a huge amount of people I can talk to but if it wasn't for {tag=ec00f0bb1c4548768f112b033b35c7e2} I probably wouldn't be here. He's helped me go through some times and we've just bonded so well.

My best memory on Avicus had to be the time I was pulled into the admin office and was offered the chance to return as a junior mod. Just getting offered was so meaningful and it really meant a lot.

{tag=f876b8631ccd4ae2acad8a09e2209e81} 

To be honest you seemed kind of quirky in a way the first time I talked to you, but I think that was kind of Zac's influence on you xd. You passed your trial and seem to be doing fine, nothing special but nothing bad.

{tag=b9c6ccd578554826a470295f749de33d}

I'll admit this right here and then, Avicus doesn't have a good player base, our player base isn't very good, but it's the community that holds us together. I've met so many people that I've created a great relationship with and just talking to them makes me want to stay here. There was a time where I wanted to leave, but those friends kept me here.

{tag=bff56e079469477281be84fc627ea113}

You're friendly but I'll have to admit sometimes it can kept annoying. You take your job very serious which is good but can also be hard to work with, but I've had some good memories and you're a good friend.

I don't have an exact answer of what motivates me as a staff member, I guess this goes for a lot of people and it's the promotions people strive for. I'm currently happy where I am.

My Avicus goals would be to place in a tournament & meet up with someone irl from Avicus.

My irl goals would be to work at Disney or dance on broadway :].

{tag=c58188cb25d84d4497b111a598917f1b}

You start up so many uncessary arguments to the point where I can't stand it anymore. Some say your demotion was truthful and other say it was bias, I still don't know what side I'm on. You're nice and all but just so many un-needed arguments start up because of you.

One. Since I'm staff it's my job to be active on Avicus services. Two. The community compared to other servers is tight and that just helps make the server that much better.

{tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383}

You're an all around hella good player and a good friend. We've had some good times together as a junior mod and I wish to see that rank back on you possibly once again. I always get a kick out of watching you and ryan together.

{tag=6c5d778327fd4ac58a1dba35206edf53}

The only reason you retired was because someone leaked your demotion to you, your trackpad pvp reminds me of my grandma playing with her left hand. The only reason you screenshared last tournament was to try and push Cacal through the finals, which didn't happen.     Man that was terrible, but smh.

{tag=a9f11454beac4cc3a1381780802c8794} 

You're so freaking nice and helpful it's insane, you shouyld of gotten senior before you retired but oh well. I remember meeting you for the first time, you were so nice and funnt and all around a good person to hang around.

{tag=b50fa15b67fe4b528105e2cf21ced66d}

I personally haven't seen you much as a ref, but you tend to get the job done and you're helpful in game. Maturity is a big thing I find you run off of which is a good thing to have.

{tag=8916e7d9eebe4a9b832f5ce3fdbaef07}

Haven't seen you much, but I've heard both bad and good things about ya, not much I can say.

{tag=2d6f79100ad94d87b5285beb41c150ce}

Oh boy, okay. You don't know how many people that have told me I tryharded my way through mentor, TSDev & Mod. But the fact is I don't do it intentially, it may look like it but as I said before, I'm happy where I am. The fact that people have to message me to stop tryharding hurts in a way.

{tag=c29bef37d8e242a9b74604f2df78f374}

You're a crazy good leader and a good player, works hard as a mapdev and I honestly woudn't mind you as a mod if you returned. 

{tag=718f0061ce15403ca3d45c2852b37434}

Sick player and a nice person. {tag=a41143680a884744af8de67cc40ba40b} might be above you as a greater friend because she talks xd, but you're a good friend and it's fun playing with you.
replies.body_tagged:
BoldAndBrash 

Well, we're having my birthday celebration today and I ordered this cookie dough cake, so probabaly that xd.

AbusiveUser

Person: You're honestly so friendly and I'm so glad I got to meet you. You were an extremely good junior mod and I can't wait to see how you perform as a full mod. You tend to stress a lot which isn't needed xd, but overall a real chill nice player.

Player: I haven`t seen you much as a player, but seeing as you`re in Cronus and how well they`re doing, you probably aren`t that bad.

I kind of found "Acceqted" wasn't mature and "Strucken" was. There was some things I did as Acceqted and in a way I wanted a clean slate or restart.

I have a huge amount of people I can talk to but if it wasn't for Arigenn I probably wouldn't be here. He's helped me go through some times and we've just bonded so well.

My best memory on Avicus had to be the time I was pulled into the admin office and was offered the chance to return as a junior mod. Just getting offered was so meaningful and it really meant a lot.

_DISTRACTION_ 

To be honest you seemed kind of quirky in a way the first time I talked to you, but I think that was kind of Zac's influence on you xd. You passed your trial and seem to be doing fine, nothing special but nothing bad.

gyalchester

I'll admit this right here and then, Avicus doesn't have a good player base, our player base isn't very good, but it's the community that holds us together. I've met so many people that I've created a great relationship with and just talking to them makes me want to stay here. There was a time where I wanted to leave, but those friends kept me here.

Camemes

You're friendly but I'll have to admit sometimes it can kept annoying. You take your job very serious which is good but can also be hard to work with, but I've had some good memories and you're a good friend.

I don't have an exact answer of what motivates me as a staff member, I guess this goes for a lot of people and it's the promotions people strive for. I'm currently happy where I am.

My Avicus goals would be to place in a tournament & meet up with someone irl from Avicus.

My irl goals would be to work at Disney or dance on broadway :].

SnowSX3

You start up so many uncessary arguments to the point where I can't stand it anymore. Some say your demotion was truthful and other say it was bias, I still don't know what side I'm on. You're nice and all but just so many un-needed arguments start up because of you.

One. Since I'm staff it's my job to be active on Avicus services. Two. The community compared to other servers is tight and that just helps make the server that much better.

Xuph

You're an all around hella good player and a good friend. We've had some good times together as a junior mod and I wish to see that rank back on you possibly once again. I always get a kick out of watching you and ryan together.

_Nathy

The only reason you retired was because someone leaked your demotion to you, your trackpad pvp reminds me of my grandma playing with her left hand. The only reason you screenshared last tournament was to try and push Cacal through the finals, which didn't happen.     Man that was terrible, but smh.

Crazy_ 

You're so freaking nice and helpful it's insane, you shouyld of gotten senior before you retired but oh well. I remember meeting you for the first time, you were so nice and funnt and all around a good person to hang around.

PosteGamer

I personally haven't seen you much as a ref, but you tend to get the job done and you're helpful in game. Maturity is a big thing I find you run off of which is a good thing to have.

2BJ

Haven't seen you much, but I've heard both bad and good things about ya, not much I can say.

JDKL

Oh boy, okay. You don't know how many people that have told me I tryharded my way through mentor, TSDev & Mod. But the fact is I don't do it intentially, it may look like it but as I said before, I'm happy where I am. The fact that people have to message me to stop tryharding hurts in a way.

Legoche

You're a crazy good leader and a good player, works hard as a mapdev and I honestly woudn't mind you as a mod if you returned. 

Okiba

Sick player and a nice person. Allyza might be above you as a greater friend because she talks xd, but you're a good friend and it's fun playing with you.

replies.body: opinions
replies.body_tagged: opinions

replies.body:
Thanks for the nice opinion.

Also, I just wanted to say, don't take shit from people who think you try harded as a staff member. I rose up pretty fast too, and no one called me a try harder. People get to where you are for a reason, and typically it's because they're just good at what they do.
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks for the nice opinion.

Also, I just wanted to say, don't take shit from people who think you try harded as a staff member. I rose up pretty fast too, and no one called me a try harder. People get to where you are for a reason, and typically it's because they're just good at what they do.

replies.body:
{tag=18056f6655144dec9cb885d052e1d54c}

Player: You're decent but needs to work on melee. Your communication is fine, nothing special.

Person: Fun to talk too and chill in a way. You kind of stick to only certain people but you're doing a good job as a mod to be honest.

Uh... Excessive Infractions

Probably Cobalt.

My mom probably XD.

Probably UHC games.

Rendezvous

Wahiz

Don't play very often xd, Villahe?

{tag=e3c3f34f49d742279b9db29d9a3b97f8}

You were on of my favourite seniors and I'm glad you got on Apollo.  I'm really sad you left but we're on good terms (I think). 

{tag=1865ac01271f4f69b979b43a78c39989}

Destroy the H8TÉR$

Youre chill and nice,but sometimes like {tag=c58188cb25d84d4497b111a598917f1b} you start arguments which are unneeded. You seem to be working for map dev which I believe you deserve another chance.

{tag=99b8a2a4cb224ba1a6837cd90a02aac5}

Definitley for the player base to hit 200 players before I leave if it ever happens.

Okay, this is brutally honest, so let's get started. I really had an urge against you when we were juniors, you hogged infractions and didn't communicate, once you became mod I didn't see much improvement and you just kept on making careless mistakes, and to be honest, I highly wanted you gone. I've seen small improvements along the way and I hope you really improve faster. You're a great guy and you seem to have good intentions. You keep on talking about Cammy4Senior and it urges me more than you'd think. I also found you try harder for senior or anything the first couple months you were promoted, but it's seemed to tone down.

Youre chill and nice,but sometimes like SnowSX3 you start arguments which are unneeded. You seem to be working for map dev which I believe you deserve another chance.

Junr

Definitley for the player base to hit 200 players before I leave if it ever happens.

Okay, this is brutally honest, so let's get started. I really had an urge against you when we were juniors, you hogged infractions and didn't communicate, once you became mod I didn't see much improvement and you just kept on making careless mistakes, and to be honest, I highly wanted you gone. I've seen small improvements along the way and I hope you really improve faster. You're a great guy and you seem to have good intentions. You keep on talking about Cammy4Senior and it urges me more than you'd think. I also found you try harder for senior or anything the first couple months you were promoted, but it's seemed to tone down.

Their personality
Their personality

Avicus & ThePark
Hi my names AbusiveUser and the only way I got promoted to junior was because of my timezone HUHHHHHHHHHHHH


{tag=398fb956587f4ec7ac8d9474648022de}
You can sometimes be funny but at other times your just plain annoying. I'm cool being your homie and all but you take stuff way to far, you need to chill.

{tag=456c20d626d5470980b540bf9307bf4c}
You're chill and fun to talk with, you sometimes get carried away with conversations but your all around a great guy.

{tag=52448b1571a747cdae4f7f0631012202}
They're good at some maps but need to work on others, I see potential.
The community as bondage for sure.
Dog

{tag=5a0b55defddb448caf5070856cbf39ee}
I have mixed emotions, you seemed fine but once I really saw you as a staff member I don't think we got along. Your ways of dealing with situations are different than mine and the way you partake in conversations kills me a little, it's almost like you really want senior but you can't find the way to get there, confusing but sometimes frustrating to be honest.

{tag=3cce00809faa48f982cf64410305822a}
Seth babe, you're honestly one of the best seniors I've ever met. You're active at taking requests and you've done a lot so far in the map development section. You're nice to talk to and handle your ranks well with maturity and honour, you take your job seiously but also can have fun at the same time. Great friend and I can come to you about almost anything.

{tag=54964b606ce749229a4c2b981d8c2ed7}
You were such a great friend and even with out timezone differences we still managed to talk all the time, you were one of my favourite mods and I'm so happy you got builder - it was well deserved. You should return as mod, we could use your voice + we should talk soon!









;)

{tag=4b50f55529e04fd7aef8d20a157df16e}
Cookie Dough
Regular?
Senior Moderator
Hang around and talk on Teamspeak.
They're fine, don't mind them nor highly enjoy them
Tight and fun to hang around

replies.body: Bump! (Some questions haven't been answered yet)

replies.body:
Sorry for the late responses!


{tag=ba601988d27b4349ae154b0a1424bfa8}

You're a great guy and even though we haven't talked much, you're chill and I'm glad you returned as a mod, I have a feeling you will make your way up to senior once again :P.

{tag=bd133f12724a4ca9af7bf808810aa835}

You're chill n all and sometimes you go a little far to the point where it's rude. But otherwise you're a good player, you definitely need a microphone, you don't know how much better you'd be.

{tag=c2a4c847653e482ab62ed7f8b64330cb}

We've had our ups and downs but in the end we're always friends. You're a good guy that sometimes can get off the hook with things he shouldn't be doing but over all, friendly, caring & decent developer.

A dev_revs could dev if A dev_revs could rev a dev?

{tag=b8ee253714ff484dae1d8146fcfa8fe1}

Once I left Cronus, I personally wasn't a big fan of you. You were really salty and kind of rude to other teams. But now that you're promoted, you're chill and a really nice guy. I hope you do well as a media and look forward to working with you at [REDACTED] for the tournament.

{tag=fb57ed989f4140c78e61dee46d34d427}

You're an awesome guy xd. I'm really glad to see you got junior and from what I've seen you're doing an excellent job. Really try to sohw leadership, it's a big thing juniors lack.

{tag=ea04a2d6e90345639241586d89cafb06}

A lil gay is okey ;)
